title: Are the pairs represent a function?
text: Think about the condition that makes some x-y pairs a function.

title: If pairs represent a function, each x-value is matched with only one y-value.
text: So, are the pairs in this question a function?

subHints.title: What x values have two ys?
subHints.text: What x values have two ys? If there is more than one of such x value, please enter it as (a,b,c) where $$a<b<c$$.
